sub_title: Azure Certified Data Engineer | MSc. Animal Science
summary:
I am an aspiring data engineer with a background in animal science. I have a Microsoft Azure Certified Data & AI degree at Techionista Academy, where I have acquired hands-on experience in cloud infrastructure, data analysis, and data visualization using Azure, SQL, Power BI, and Python.

For a business case, I collaborated with a team to build a Lambda architecture on Azure for real-time and batch processing of data from the Vendée Globe sailing event. We analyzed large datasets and created an interactive Power BI dashboard to reveal race dynamics and performance indicators. In addition, I have also presented my animal welfare expertise to national and international audiences, using behavioural science and empathy to help horse enthusiasts. My specialities were extreme fear and aggression issues. I have designed and taught three online courses on horse emotions, cognition, and positive reinforcement training, earning an exceptional average rating of 8.7/10 from over 400 students. 

I am now seeking a fulfilling opportunity to launch my career in data engineering, where I can leverage my skills and knowledge in Azure, SQL, Power BI. I am eager to learn from and contribute to a team that shares my values of innovation, collaboration, and social impact. You can reach me at suzydeurinck@gmail.com.

Location: Dordrecht - Breda

projects.title: Business Case "Vendee Globe"
projects.description:
We embarked on a challenging journey to develop a cloud-based Lambda Architecture on Microsoft Azure. Inspired by the Vendée Globe solo sailboat race, we aimed to process telemetry data from racing boats in real-time and batch mode. Our goal: create a captivating PowerBI dashboard for race enthusiasts, even in the absence of live data.

Leveraging Azure services like Event Hub, Stream Analytics, Data Lake Gen 2, and Synapse Analytics, we built a robust architecture. We didn't stop there; we integrated a Python race simulation app to generate telemetry data, showcasing our end-to-end data processing pipeline.

Our PowerBI dashboard offers real-time boat tracking on a world map and live rankings. Even with simulated data, we gained valuable insights, demonstrating our data engineering prowess and the potential of Azure in real-world applications.

🛠️ Technologies: Azure Event Hub, Stream Analytics, Data Lake Gen 2, Synapse Analytics, Power BI, Python, GitHub, and Azure Portal.

Our methodology included Python simulator setup, Event Hub configuration, Stream Analytics job creation, stream analytics query optimization, Data Lake Gen2 utilization, and Power BI dashboard development.

This project exemplifies our collaborative efforts, technical skills, and passion for data engineering.

projects.title: Data Driven Hotel Analysis in PowerBI
projects.description:
A comprehensive analysis of tourist hotel reviews and ratings, showcasing data-driven insights and methodologies. Developed as a business case project at Techionista Academy.

Overview
At Techionista Academy, our team of five embarked on a business case project aimed at gaining practical experience in preparation for careers as data engineers. This particular case, closely tied to the Microsoft PL300 exam, centered around the analysis of hotel reviews from the fictional website Techionista Holidays spanning the years 2015 to 2017. Our focus was on various aspects of the reviewers and hotels, including nationalities, traveler types, and hotel locations. This repository serves as a comprehensive repository of our work, analyzing a dataset consisting of a staggering 515,000 records pertaining to holiday trends.

Techionista Holidays' managers expressed a strong desire to gain deeper insights into the different types of travelers and their feedback. These valuable insights can play a pivotal role in enhancing Techionista's Holidays website and their capacity to cater to the evolving needs of their users.

Objective
Our primary objective was to craft an all-encompassing interactive dashboard that offers valuable insights into different categories of travelers and their feedback. These insights would, in turn, be harnessed to enhance the Techionista Holidays website, ensuring a more tailored and effective user experience.

authors.headline: Azure Certified Data Engineer | MSc. Animal Science

profile_positions.description:
I actively pursued comprehensive training in cloud computing with Microsoft Azure, refined data analysis and modeling skills using Power BI, and started with programming languages including SQL and Python. I also immersed myself in AI fundamentals and data engineering on Microsoft Azure, gaining expertise in responsible AI development and data integration techniques. 

This comprehensive education has provided me with a robust foundation in cutting-edge technologies, empowering me to drive data-driven decision-making and innovative solutions. During this time period, I cleared the following three exams:
● Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900) 
● Microsoft Power BI Data Analyst (PL-300)
● Data Engineering on Microsoft Azure (DP-203)
profile_positions.title: Training Data Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Collaborated with fellow students during my training at Techionista Academy on an engaging data engineering project. Together, we successfully implemented a cloud-based Lambda Architecture on Azure, leveraging Event Hub, Stream Analytics, and Power BI to process telemetry data from a simulated fleet of racing boats. Our teamwork enabled the creation of a real-time data processing path and a batch-processing path for historical analysis. 

We designed an interactive Power BI dashboard, providing real-time boat positions on a world map and live team rankings. Additionally, we configured a Python simulator for data generation and harnessed Azure Data Lake Gen2 and Synapse Analytics for data storage and analysis. This experience showcased our collective expertise in Python, Azure, and Power BI, highlighting our journey in data engineering.
profile_positions.title: Data Engineer - Student Business Case "Vendee Globe"

profile_positions.description:
- Conducted a comprehensive hotel review analysis project at Techionista Academy, closely aligned with the Microsoft PL300 exam.
- Analyzed 515,000 records from Techionista Holidays, focusing on traveler types, nationalities, and hotel locations.
- Developed an interactive dashboard with advanced filtering options to provide insights for improving the Techionista Holidays website.
- Leveraged Azure Blob Storage, Power BI, and DAX for data analysis, transformation, and visualization.
- Collaborated with a team of five to achieve project objectives.
profile_positions.title: Data Engineer - Student Business Case "Data Driven Hotel Analysis"

profile_positions.description:
Coached horse enthusiasts to develop science-based, leadership-free relationships with their horses, using a combination of behavioral science and empathy.

● Recognized as an animal welfare expert, presenting to audiences of over 250 people and
providing demonstrations on national and international shows. Frequently sought out for
interviews and podcasts.

● Expertise in using low-key stress handling techniques to help horses that display extreme
fear or aggression, achieving lasting results for both human and horse.

● Designed and taught three engaging online courses to 400+ students, covering horse
emotions, cognition, and positive reinforcement training. Earned an exceptional average
rating of 8.7/10 for the final course.

● Mentored and trained more than 100 horse enthusiasts annually through online coaching
sessions, resulting in improved horse-handling skills and techniques.
profile_positions.title: Science-based Equine Behaviourist | Horse Trainer
